structure.unit: Real And Personal Property And Domestic Relations
The Land Court And Registration Of Title To Land

law.catch_line: Dealing With Registered Land; Filing Letters Of Attorney
law.text: Any person may, by attorney, procure land to be registered and convey or otherwise deal with registered land, but the letters of attorney shall be acknowledged and filed with the recorder or the assistant recorder of the proper registry district and registered. Any instrument revoking such letter shall be acknowledged and registered in like manner.
